name: The Depths: Prehistoric Survival
description:
The Depths is a Semi-realistic Prehistoric Survival MMO game, where the player can become a prehistoric creature of their choice from different environments such as swamps, oceans or plains. The Depths will heavily focus on aquatic creatures and their interactions with other creatures in their environment. The game will feature 20 creatures at the start, from full aquatic creatures such as the Mosasarus or the Semi-aquatic creatures like Spinosaurus.

We are focusing on a quest system based on semi-realistic adventures and a growth leveling system that will impact the characters stats.

We will be introducing different works of mating, such as mating dances and bringing gifts. Nothing is better than seeing your mate do a dance!
